languages.text: [Окинуть взглядом прислужников Саргоны] "Кому пиратская жизнь опостылела — сражайтесь за меня. Сами знаете, что в такой ситуации право взойти на борт зарабатывают кровью".
[Look at Sargona's henchmen] "If you have grown weary of the pirate's life — stand and fight with me. You all know that, in such circumstances, the right to come aboard is earned with blood."
languages.original_text: [Окинуть взглядом прислужников Саргоны] "Кому пиратская жизнь опостылела — сражайтесь за меня. Сами знаете, что в такой ситуации право взойти на борт зарабатывают кровью".

traits.locale_text: [Look at Sargona's henchmen] "If you have grown weary of the pirate's life — stand and fight with me. You all know that, in such circumstances, the right to come aboard is earned with blood."
[Look at Sargona's henchmen] "Those of you who have come to resent a pirate's life — stand and fight with me. You know that in a situation like this, one's right to come aboard is earned with blood."
[Look at Sargona's henchmen] "If you have grown weary of the pirate's life — stand and fight with me. You all know that, in such circumstances, the right to come aboard is earned with blood."
[Look at Sargona's henchmen] "If you have grown weary of the pirate's life — stand and fight with me. You all know that, in such circumstances, the right to come aboard is earned with blood."
[Look at Sargona's henchmen] "If you have grown weary of the pirate's life — stand and fight with me. You all know that, in such circumstances, the right to come aboard is earned with blood."
[Look at Sargona's henchmen] "If you have grown weary of the pirate's life — stand and fight with me. You all know that, in such circumstances, the right to come aboard is earned with blood."

languages.text: [Sargonas Schergen ansehen] "Falls Ihr des Piratenlebens müde seid – stellt Euch und kämpft gegen mich. Ihr wisst alle, dass das Recht, an Bord zu gehen, unter solchen Umständen mit Blut erstritten wird."
languages.original_text: [Look at Sargona's henchmen] "If you have grown weary of the pirate's life — stand and fight with me. You all know that, in such circumstances, the right to come aboard is earned with blood."

traits.locale_text: [Sargonas Schergen ansehen] "Falls Ihr des Piratenlebens müde seid – stellt Euch und kämpft gegen mich. Ihr wisst alle, dass das Recht, an Bord zu gehen, unter solchen Umständen mit Blut erstritten wird."

languages.text: [Regarder les sbires de Sargona] « Si vous vous lassez de la vie de pirate, alors, joignez-vous à moi. Sachez que dans de telles circonstances, vous ne pourrez monter à bord qu'après avoir payé votre dette de sang. »
languages.original_text: [Look at Sargona's henchmen] "If you have grown weary of the pirate's life — stand and fight with me. You all know that, in such circumstances, the right to come aboard is earned with blood."

traits.locale_text: [Regarder les sbires de Sargona] « Si vous vous lassez de la vie de pirate, alors, joignez-vous à moi. Sachez que dans de telles circonstances, vous ne pourrez monter à bord qu'après avoir payé votre dette de sang. »

languages.text: [看着萨戈纳的手下]“如果你们厌倦了海盗的生活，就为我而战吧。你们都很清楚，在这种情况下，只有交了投名状的人才有上船的权利。”
languages.original_text: [Look at Sargona's henchmen] "If you have grown weary of the pirate's life — stand and fight with me. You all know that, in such circumstances, the right to come aboard is earned with blood."

traits.locale_text: [看着萨戈纳的手下]“如果你们厌倦了海盗的生活，就为我而战吧。你们都很清楚，在这种情况下，只有交了投名状的人才有上船的权利。”

languages.text: [Mirar a los secuaces de Sargona] «Si os habéis cansado de la piratería, levantaos y luchad junto a mí. Todos sabéis que, en estas circunstancias, el derecho a subir a bordo se gana con sangre».
languages.original_text: [Look at Sargona's henchmen] "If you have grown weary of the pirate's life — stand and fight with me. You all know that, in such circumstances, the right to come aboard is earned with blood."

traits.locale_text: [Mirar a los secuaces de Sargona] «Si os habéis cansado de la piratería, levantaos y luchad junto a mí. Todos sabéis que, en estas circunstancias, el derecho a subir a bordo se gana con sangre».

languages.text: [サルゴナの手下たちを見る]「もし君たちが海賊の生活に飽きているなら、立ち上がって{mf|俺|私}と戦え。このような状況では、乗船する権利は血で得られることを、君たちも知っているはずだ」
languages.original_text: [Look at Sargona's henchmen] "If you have grown weary of the pirate's life — stand and fight with me. You all know that, in such circumstances, the right to come aboard is earned with blood."

traits.locale_text: [サルゴナの手下たちを見る]「もし君たちが海賊の生活に飽きているなら、立ち上がって{mf|俺|私}と戦え。このような状況では、乗船する権利は血で得られることを、君たちも知っているはずだ」

languages.text: [Sargona'nın adamlarına bak] "Korsan hayatından bıkan varsa ayağa kalksın da benimle savaşsın. İyi bilirsiniz ki böyle zamanlarda gemiye çıkma hakkı ancak ve ancak kanla kazanılır."
languages.original_text: [Look at Sargona's henchmen] "If you have grown weary of the pirate's life — stand and fight with me. You all know that, in such circumstances, the right to come aboard is earned with blood."

traits.locale_text: [Sargona'nın adamlarına bak] "Korsan hayatından bıkan varsa ayağa kalksın da benimle savaşsın. Sizler iyi bilirsiniz ki böyle zamanlarda gemiye çıkma hakkı ancak ve ancak kanla kazanılır."
